connect20/cybage_marketplace.name: connect20/Cybage_Marketplace

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/cybage_marketplace.description: You can convert your existing website to Marketplace using this Marketplace plug-in. This plug-in provides easy steps for sellers to register themselves, add products, manage orders, and communicate with buyers.
